### Autoclave

**Reference Number:** WS3835751557-Doc3835810979
**Solicitation Number:** WS3835751557
**Publication Date:** 24 August 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** 24 October 2023, 14:00:00
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Amendment Date:** 13 October 2023

### Tender Details

* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

The tender is open to contractors who are part of the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Regions and Contact Information

* **Region of Delivery:** Ottawa
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
	+ Phone: [Not Available]
	+ Fax: [Not Available]
	+ Email: [chad.bellerdine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:chad.bellerdine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice URL

Visit the following URL to access the tender notice: 
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17259832?extsite=MTcyNTk4MzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Product Details

The tender is for the supply of Autoclave equipment with a reported **UNSPC:** 41100000, under the classification of Labouratoire and Scientific Equipment (Équipements Scientifiques et de Laboratoire).
